Verses: 1 ippadiyirukka, Dhevan Thammudaiya Janangalaith Thallivittaaro Endru Ketkiren, Thallividavillaiye; Naanum Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiyilum Penyameen Koththiraththilum Pirandha Isravelan.
2 dhevan Thaam Munnarindhukonda Thammudaiya Janangalaith Thallividavillai. Eliyaavaikkuriththuch Solliya Idaththil, Vedham Sollugiradhai Ariyeergalaa? Avan Dhevanai Nokki:

3 karththaave, Ummudaiya Theerkkadharisigalai Avargal Kolaiseydhu, Ummudaiya Balipeedangalai Idiththuppottaargal; Naan Oruvanmaaththiram Meedhiyaayirukkiren, En Piraananaiyum Vaangaththedugiraargale Endru Isravelarukku Virodhamaai Vinnappampanninapodhu,
4 avanukku Undaana Dhevauththaravu Enna? Paagaalukku Munbaaga Muzhangaarpadiyidaadha Ezhaayiramperai Enakkaaga Meedhiyaaga Vaiththen Enbadhe.
5 appadippola Ikkaalaththileyum Kirubaiyinaale Undaagum Therindhukolludhalinpadi Oru Pangu Meedhiyaayirukkiradhu.

6 adhu Kirubaiyinaale Undaayirundhaal Kiriyaigalinaale Undaayiraadhu; Appadiyallavendraal, Kirubaiyaanadhu Kirubaiyallave. Andriyum Adhu Kiriyaigalinaale Undaayirundhaal Adhu Kirubaiyaayiraadhu; Appadiyallavendraal, Kiriyaiyaanadhu Kiriyaiyallave.
7 appadiyaanaal Enna? Isravelar Thedugiradhai Adaiyaamalirukkiraargal, Therindhukollappattavargalo Adhai Adaindhirukkiraargal; Matravargal Indraiyaththinamvaraikkum Kadinappattirukkiraargal.
8 gananiththiraiyin Aaviyaiyum, Kaanaadhirukkira Kangalaiyum, Kelaadhirukkira Kaadhugalaiyum, Dhevan Avargalukkuk Koduththaar Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiyaayitru.
9 andriyum, Avargaludaiya Pandhi Avargalukkuch Surukkum Kanniyum Idarudharkaana Kallum Badhilukkup Badhilaliththalumaagakkadavadhu;
10 kaanaadhapadikku Avargaludaiya Kangal Andhagaarappadakkadavadhu; Avargaludaiya Mudhugai Eppodhum Kuniyappannum Endru Thaaveedhum Solliyirukkiraan.

11 ippadiyirukka, Vizhundhupogumpadikkaa Idarinaargal Endru Ketkiren, Appadiyallave; Avargalukkulle Vairaakkiyaththai Ezhuppaththakkadhaaga Avargaludaiya Thavarudhalinaale Purajaadhigalukku Ratchippu Kidaiththadhu.
12 avargaludaiya Thavaru Ulagaththirku Aisuvariyamum, Avargaludaiya Kuraivu Purajaadhigalukku Aisuvariyamumaayirukka, Avargaludaiya Niraivu Evvalavu Adhigamaai Appadiyirukkum.
13 purajaadhiyaaraagiya Ungaludane Pesugiren; Purajaadhigalukku Naan Apposthalanaayirukkiradhinaale En Inaththaarukkulle Naan Vairaakkiyaththai Ezhuppi, Avargalil Silarai Ratchikkavendumendru,
14 en Oozhiyaththai Menmaippaduththugiren.
15 avargalaith Thallividudhal Ulagaththai Oppuravaakkudhalaayirukka, Avargalai Angigariththukkolludhal Ennamaayiraadhu; Mariththorilirundhu Jeevan Undaanadhupolirukkumallavo?
16 melum Mudharbalanaagiya Maavaanadhu Parisuththamaayirundhaal, Pisaindhamaa Muzhuvadhum Parisuththamaayirukkum; Veraanadhu Parisuththamaayirundhaal, Kilaigalum Parisuththamaayirukkum
17 sila Kilaigal Muriththuppodappattirukka, Kaattolivamaramaagiya Nee Avaigal Irundha Idaththil Ottavaikkappattu, Olivamaraththin Verukkum Saaraththukkum Udanpangaaliyaayirundhaayaanaal,
18 nee Andhak Kilaigalukku Virodhamaaip Perumaipaaraattaadhe; Perumai Paaraattuvaayaanaal, Nee Veraich Sumakkaamal, Ver Unnai Sumakkiradhendru Ninaiththukkol.
19 naan Ottavaikkappaduvadharku Andhak Kilaigal Muriththuppodappattadhendru Sollugiraaye.
20 nalladhu, Avisuvaasaththinaale Avaigal Muriththuppodappattana, Nee Visuvaasaththinaale Nirkiraai; Mettimai Sindhaiyaayiraamal Bayandhiru.
21 subaavakkilaigalai Dhevan Thappavidaadhirukka, Unnaiyum Thappavidamaattaar Endru Echcharikkaiyaayiru.

22 aagaiyaal, Dhevanudaiya Dhayavaiyum Kandippaiyum Paar; Vizhundhavargalidaththile Kandippaiyum, Unnidaththile Dhayavaiyum Kaanbiththaar; Andhath Dhayavile Nilaiththiruppaayaanaal Unakkuth Dhayavukidaikkum; Nilaiththiraavittaal Neeyum Vettundupovaai.
23 andriyum, Avargal Avisuvaasaththile Nilaiththiraadhirundhaal Avargalum Ottavaikkappaduvaargal, Avargalai Marupadiyum Ottavaikkiradharku Dhevan Vallavaraayirukkiraare.

24 subaavaththinpadi, Kaattolivamaraththilirundhu Nee Vettappattu, Subaavaththirku Virodhamaai Nalla Olivamaraththile Ottavaikkappattirundhaal, Subaavakkilaigalaagiya Avargal Thangal Suya Olivamaraththile Ottavaikkappaduvadhu Adhiga Nichchayamallavaa?

25 melum, Sagodharare, Neengal Ungalaiye Buththimaangalendru Ennaadhapadikku Oru Ragasiyaththai Neengal Ariyavendumendrirukkiren; Adhennavenil, Purajaadhiyaarudaiya Niraivu Undaagumvaraikkum Isravelariloru Pangukkuk Kadinamaana Manadhundaayirukkum.
26 indhappiragaaram Isravelarellaarum Ratchikkappaduvaargal. Meetkiravar Seeyonilirundhu Vandhu, Avabakdhiyai Yaakkobai Vittu Vilakkuvaar Endrum;
27 naan Avargaludaiya Paavangalai Neekkumbodhu, Idhuve Naan Avargaludane Seyyum Udanbadikkai Endrum Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
28 suviseshaththaikkuriththu Avargal Ungalnimiththam Pagaignaraayirukkiraargal; Therindhukolludhalaikkuriththu Avargal Pidhaakkalinimiththam Anbukoorappattavargalaayirukkiraargal.
29 dhevanudaiya Kirubaivarangalum, Avargalai Azhaiththa Azhaippum Maaraadhavaigale.
30 aadhalaal, Neengal Murkaalaththile Dhevanukkuk Keezhppadiyaadhirundhu, Ippozhudhu Avargaludaiya Keezhppadiyaamaiyinaale Irakkampetrirukkiradhupola,
31 avargalum Ippozhudhu Keezhppadiyaamalirundhum, Pinbu Ungalukkukkidaiththa Irakkaththinaale Irakkam Peruvaargal.
32 ellaarmelum Irakkamaayirukkaththakkadhaaga, Dhevan Ellaaraiyum Keezhppadiyaamaikkulle Adaiththuppottaar.
33 aa! Dhevanudaiya Aisuvariyam, Gnaanam, Arivu Enbavaigalin Aazham Evvalavaayirukkiradhu! Avarudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugal Alavidappadaadhavaigal, Avarudaiya Vazhigal Aaraayappadaadhavaigal!
34 karththarudaiya Sindhaiyai Arindhavan Yaar? Avarukku Aalosanaikkaaranaayirundhavan Yaar?
35 thanakkup Padhil Kidaikkumpadikku Mundhi Avarukku Ondraik Koduththavan Yaar?
36 sagalamum Avaraalum Avar Moolamaayum Avarukkaagavum Irukkiradhu; Avarukke Endrendraikkum Magimaiyundaavadhaaga. Aamen.
